title: [Large-Scale] Intensive Short-Term Multimodal Alphabet Reading and Writing Program

context.additional_context: Multimedia learning activities using tablets/smartphones in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify all 26 uppercase and lowercase letters with over 90% accuracy using multimedia content.
Learners can accurately transcribe all alphabets within a set time (30 seconds) using digital handwriting tools.
Learners can read and write simple words (up to 3 letters) with over 80% accuracy using letter-sound correspondence.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
